name: Books Written By Actors Quiz | Literature: Something in Common | 5 Questions

questions.text: The name of the book is 'Feel This Book : An Essential Guide to Self-Empowerment, Spiritual Supremacy, and Sexual Satisfaction'. Which two actors collaborated on this masterpiece?
Angel on My Shoulder: An Autobiography -This beautiful singer followed in her father's footsteps.
questions.explanation:
Natalie Cole.

	Nat King Cole's daughter Natalie definitely got her voice from her father.

questions.text: This smooth, rapper and actor has written a book entitled 'I Make My Own Rules.'
This handsome ER actor wrote this book called, 'Bedside Manners _______________ and ER'.
This brave 'Halloween' star has written numerous books for children. Both of her parents are actors.
